sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import './projects.css' import { Parallax } from 'react-scroll-parallax' import nrf1 from '../../images/renderfarm1@2x.png' import nrf2 from '../../images/renderfarm2@2x.png' import nrf3 from '../../images/renderfarm3@2x.png' import real2u1 from '../../images/real2u1@2x.png' import real2u2 from '../../images/real2u2.png' import real2u3 from '../../images/real2u3.png' import modelrepo1 from '../../images/modelrepo1@2x.png' import modelrepo2 from '../../images/modelrepo2@2x.png' import modelrepo3 from '../../images/modelrepo3@2x.png' const projects = [ { title: "Real2U – Augmented Reality and CGI", description: "Real2U is a Augmented Reality and CGI company. The website consists of a landing page where the companie's solutions, processes and cases are detailed to capture the attention of the user, and also separate pages for the solutions especifications.", participation: "In this project I have led the content creation, layout design and development. I was responsible for wirefrming, prototyping and developing the entire website. I used React.js for this project, intenting on using existing components to facilitate implementation.", live: "The website is live here.", link: "https://www.real2u.com.br/", image1: real2u1, alt1: "real2u-landingpage", image2: real2u2, alt2: "real2u-landingpage2", image3: real2u3, alt3: "real2u-product-page", parallaxXA: ['0px', '0px'], parallaxXB: ['200px', '-200px'] }, { title: "(NOT) Render Farm", description: "(NOT) Render Farm is a web plataform for cloud rendering of 3D scenes. The website consists of a one-pager, explaining the concept of the company and it's product and also a Console for the creation and managment of computer based images.", participation: "In this project I participated both in the concept and development stages. Participated in the product creation, wire-framing, user testing and final layout adjustments.", live: "The website is live here.", link: "https://notrenderfarm.com/", image1: nrf1, alt1: "notrenderfarm-landingpage", image2: nrf2, alt2: "notrenderfarm-jobs", image3: nrf3, alt3: "notrenderfarm-projects", parallaxXA: ['0px', '0px'], parallaxXB: ['-200px', '200px'] }, { title: "ModelRepo – Asset Manager", description: "This One Pager is a concept for a innovative Asset Manager. The idea is to use example wireframes and simple illustrations to communicate to the user the features and benefits of the application", participation: "I have participated in the product conceiving and led the website layout process and execution, having coded it in HTML5, CSS3 and JS all by myself.", live: "A mockup version of the website is avaliable here.", link: "https://alessandro-oshiro.github.io/one-pager-gdc/", image1: modelrepo1, alt1: "notrenderfarm-landingpage", image2: modelrepo2, alt2: "notrenderfarm-jobs", image3: modelrepo3, alt3: "notrenderfarm-projects", parallaxXA: ['0px', '0px'], parallaxXB: ['200px', '-200px'] }, ] class Projects extends Component { state = { isClickedA: false, isClickedB: false } render() { return ( <>
{projects.map((project) => ( <>
{project.title}

{project.description}

{project.participation}
{project.live}
))}
{projects.map((project) => ( <>
{project.title}

{/* {project.live} */}
))}
) } } export default Projects
